name: ThePrimate
tag_list: knowledge, research, social, web, ddc, journalism, webtv, crowdsourcing, education
overview:
ThePrimate.it started in 2009 and it is based in Rome, Italy. ThePrimate.it is a social Knowledge Market allowing people on the web to share, sell and buy high quality cultural digital contents at small price. High quality digital contents come from trusted providers or owners (100 partnership already signed).

We offer high quality digital resources coming from trusted providers and owners; We are open and at the same time “commercial”, above all for cultural+scientific goods We will improve an IoT lattice in order to match the digital cultural contents/objects in the market to the real physical objects placed in the world.

Our market is Knowledge market, i.e. that digital marketplace where people buy encyclopedia information, cultural and scientific digital contents (cultural items, scientific/archaeological/museum objects, experimental prototypes, laboratory documents, digitized artifacts, photographs, videos, entire databases).

Potential users are:

  • individuals, professionals, students
  • Institutions (cultural heritage, scientific/RTD providers/owner);
  • Educational organizations (universities, VET centers, higher education institutes, primary/secondary educational institutes);
  • Creative and cultural industries [those concerned with the creation and provision of marketable outputs (goods, services and activities) that depend on creative and cultural inputs for their value]; Media network or cultural, creative and innovative clusters
